title: Sky Sports presenter Hayley McQueen 'besotted' after birth of baby daughter
text:
Hayley McQueen and husband Kirk Newmann with newborn baby, Ayla (Picture: Hayley McQueen/Instagram)

Sky Sports presenter Hayley McQueen just shared the most adorable photos of her new baby daughter, right after giving birth on Thursday.

Hayley and her partner Kirk Newmann also announced they were calling their new bundle of joy, Ayla McQueen-Newmann.

The 39-year-old presenter shared a photo of herself lying on the hospital bed while hubby Kirk held the newborn up to the camera for an adorable family photo.

There’s also a split screen of the two new parents lovingly holding their new bubba.

Hayley McQueen and husband Kirk Newmann with newborn baby, Ayla (Picture: Hayley McQueen/Instagram)

‘Here she is!’ Hayley wrote on Instagram on Friday. ‘Our darling baby daughter Ayla McQueen-Newmann, we couldn’t be more in love with her.’

Baby Ayla was due at the end of September, but Hayley revealed the little one kept them waiting.

She continued: ‘She arrived just in time for lunch, wide eyed, inquisitive and looks just like her daddy [Kirk Newmann] and a healthy 8lb 2oz.’

The couple also shared a Wikipedia screenshot of the meaning behind their newborn’s name.

Hayley added: ‘The name we chose couldn’t be more perfect for her with both Scottish and Turkish roots and my occasional nickname Halo. Completely besotted beyond words and feel utterly blessed.’

Kirk Newman and Hayley McQueen (Picture: Anthony Harvey/REX)

Kirk also took to Instagram to thank his wife Hayley for ‘blessing’ him ‘with an angel’.

Sports podcaster Stan Collymore congratulated the happy couple on Instagram: ‘Huge congratulations Hayley. Wonderful to see Mum, Dad and baby well and happy’.

While British television and radio presenter Seema Jaswal responded: ‘Such a beautiful pic! So happy for you both… congratulations.’
